text: Sorority Row is a 2009 American horror thriller movie. It is a remake of The House on Sorority Row. It was released on September 11, 2009. Rumer Willis plays Ellie, and Audrina Patridge plays Megan. The movie is about a serial killer targeting a group of college students. Sorority Row was filmed in Pennsylvania. The reviews were negative for this movie. title: Sorority Row
